mapper.insert: insert into tbl_host(host_no, host_email, host_pwd, host_name, cp_reg_no, cp_name) values(SEQ_HOST.nextval, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{onerName}, #{business_id}, #{companyName})
mapper.select: SELECT district_no FROM ( SELECT d.district_no, district_name FROM tbl_province p JOIN tbl_district d ON p.prov_no = d.fk_prov_no WHERE p.prov_name = #{districtname} ) V WHERE TRIM(V.district_name) = TRIM(#{subdistrictname})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ACOMODATION(acom_no, fk_spec_no, fk_district_no, fk_host_no, acom_name, acom_image, address, extra_address, sur_info, parking_info, acom_latitude, acom_longitude) values(SEQ_ACOMODATION.nextval, #{accommodationSpec}, #{district_no}, #{host_no}, #{companyName}, #{AcomoImagefile}, #{address}, #{extra_address}, #{aroundInfo}, #{parkInfo}, #{lat}, #{lng})
